name: Multiplayer Offroad Racing
description:
Quad Bike Racing Game With 20 Long Challenging Levels & Multiplayer Action!

In Offroad Extreme you will need to use your quad bike to carefully navigate your way through these long 20 levels. This is no ordinary trials style game as it will leave you in amazement by the obstacles that are set out to stop you. Medals will be awarded for fantastic times, collect stars throughout the levels. Customize your UI, choose your color, find the perfect combinations to gain extra speed while climbing or descending down ramps. Collecting Medals and Stars will count towards your overall progression which you will definitely need once the next level packs are released!

• 20 Levels!
• Trial Bike Style Game!
• Challenging Obstacles!
• Awesome Quad Physics!
